Latest

The hum of his oversized laptop droned as his fingers slapped away at the in-built plastic keyboard. One roommate sat diagonal to him in the corner nook, smothered by pillows, eyes fixated on a sleeker computer. Behind, on a snakey, black and white striped couch, lay a couple in comfy pyjamas.
